title: Apparently I am banned
body:
I haven't really played league of legends since around October of last year, since I have been quite busy with Junior year and whatnot. I decided I'd pick it back up over the summer, and I come to find out I am permanently banned. Is there a way to appeal / can i get some info on why I am banned? Did my account get hijacked or something?
Thanks

replies.body: From looking at your account, it does appear to have been permanently suspended around October of last year.  It is possible that the punishment occurred immediately after you stopped playing, and it was never seen since you took a break.  However, if you are confident that you did nothing on your account to warrant a suspension and believe it was hacked, then make sure to [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  Our agents should be able to work with you one-on-one in order to get to investigate deeper.
